EmailTemplate.subject: Complete Your Week With a VMT-Shirt
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Weekend Is Coming. Dress Like A Warrior. "When I got mine, the first thing I did was burn all of my dress clothes." - Earl Sherman, Lead Virtualization Architect When we got our new logo, the first thing we did was buy 1,000 white t-shirts, and plaster them with green goodness. No, not kale paste... The Green Circle (of virtual health) for which we have grown so famous. And thus, the VMT-Shirt <http://bit.ly/1o7fnV5> was born.
Click Here to claim your FREE VMT-Shirt <http://bit.ly/1o7fnV5>*. Fill out the form, and we'll reach out to schedule a quick 30-minute demo in your environment. Complete the demo, and our intern Dani will pack and ship your VMT-Shirt.
Hurry though. These VMTees are running hot. Enjoy the weekend, warriors.
Love, VMTurbo
*Due to logistics issues, this offer only applies to IT Pros residing in the US, Canada, UK, Ireland, the Nordics, and Benelux with 10+ hosts in their environment. We apologize for any sadness. Make Dani Work <http://bit.ly/1o7fnV5> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
